articles.title: China, Argentina pledge closer ties on currency, ‘Belt and Road’
articles.description: China is a major buyer of Argentine soybeans and beef. It also has a major currency swap deal with the country, which helps to bolster its dwindling foreign reserves. Fernandez is battling to revive the economy of Argentina, a major grains producer.
articles.content:
Argentinian President Alberto Fernandez gestures during a joint news conference with Russian President Vladimir Putin, following their talks in the Kremlin in Moscow, Russia, on Feb. 3, 2022.Sergei Karpukhin/The Associated Press

articles.title: China, Argentina pledge to deepen partnership, expand trade
articles.description: BEIJING, Feb 6 (Reuters) - China and Argentina pledged on Sunday to deepen their strategic partnership and expand and diversify trade, China's state media said after a meeting of presidents Xi Jinping and Alberto Fernandez.The leaders, meeting on the sidelines of the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics, agreed on a five-year plan on agricultural cooperation and identified key areas
articles.content:
BEIJING, Feb 6 (Reuters) - China and Argentina pledged on Sunday to deepen their strategic partnership and expand and diversify trade, China's state media said after a meeting of presidents Xi Jinping and Alberto Fernandez.

articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Juan Martín del Potro, who won the 2009 U.S. Open, says he is likely to retire from professional tennis after playing tournaments in Buenos Aires this week and then in Rio de Janeiro.
Del Potro’s career has been marred ... [745 chars]

articles.title: Tennis-Del Potro close to retirement as injuries take their toll
articles.description: Argentine tennis player Juan Martin Del Potro is considering an imminent retirement from the sport, saying recurring injuries mean two tournaments in Argentina and Brazil this month will "possibly" be his last. "This is one of the hardest messages I've ever had to face up to and communicate," the 33-year-old told reporters in Buenos Aires on Saturday.
articles.content:
